== Quick Facts ==
  * [http://conflictterra.googlecode.com/files/CT_Fishbone_Ridgev7.sd7 Download]
  * Supports up to 13 players
  * 20 x 10

----

== Description ==
CT Fishbone Ridge is an interesting map.  A spine-like ridge runs through the middle, with initial starting spots in small canyons jutting from the ridge.  Cacti and boulders stand in this desert battleground.
